channel.title: Pain in the ass
channel.description:
I know this is a dumb quest becuase
if(findcolor(x,y,10989748,0,0,1104,703))then;
is an outdated function but when i use it, most of the time it clicks a different colour to what i picked is thoer anyway to make it 100% pik only the colour i picked?
thx

item.title: Pain in the ass
item.dc:creator: @iruleatants iruleatants
item.description:
@iruleatants wrote:

[quote=“Surajd, post:5, topic:2069”][quote author=iruleatants link=topic=2166.msg20426#msg20426 date=1146269617]

[code][code]fix your post it should be

this is the correct procedure:

if(findcolor(x,y,10989748,1,1,1104,703))then

or

if(FindColorSpiral(x,y,10989748,1,1,1104,703))then[/CODE]

Please stop spamming as I have already Reported you on a number of occasions.
[/code]
[/quote][/quote]

how is this spam???(okay this might be but…) im informing you(read the rules)

Read full topic

item.title: Pain in the ass
item.dc:creator: @Surajd Surajd
item.description:
@Surajd wrote:

This is the correct procedure:

if(findcolor(x,y,10989748,1,1,1104,703))then

or

if(FindColorSpiral(x,y,10989748,1,1,1104,703))then

Note: Make sure you check your ending co-ords if they are correct or not.

Read full topic

item.title: Pain in the ass
item.dc:creator: @iruleatants iruleatants
item.description:
@iruleatants wrote:

IT will only click the color you pick, this mean the where it click was that color

but put it in this format and it might work better

if findcolor(x,y,10989748,0,0,1104,703) then

Read full topic
